text: Williamson Sylvester Stuckey Jr. (born May 25, 1935) is an American businessman and a politician. He is a former member of the Democratic Party. He was CEO of the Stuckey's chain of gift shops from 1985 until 2019.Stuckey's Corporation Company Information. Hoover's. Retrieved 2012-10-09. He was also a member of the United States House of Representatives representing Georgia's 8th congressional district from 1967 until 1977. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Georgia Category:Businesspeople from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: W. S. Stuckey Jr.
